column15: Buy original Philips Micro Theatre - MCD388 at best price in India. Read its features  reviews and specifications. Get fast & assured delivery all over India.
column17:
Experience audio and video like never before with the wall mountable Philips Micro Theatre MCD388

Philips Micro theatre (Model: MCD388) features:

 

  • Digital wireless active subwoofer for powerful bass
  • Digital Sound Control for optimized music style settings
  • Loudness for bass and treble enhancement
  • Dynamic Bass Boost for deep and dramatic sound
  • Total 100W RMS
  • USB Direct and SDHC card slots for music and video playback
  • MP3 Link for portable music playback
